title: M Boutique Ipoh
contentText: Get a Premier Room at RM198 with breakfast (n/p: RM480).
Download the MyMaxis App now to redeem your rewards.
tncList: Valid for bookings from 1 March 2016 - 30 June 2016.
Valid for stays from 1 March – 30 December 2016.
Original app voucher must be present at the point of redemption.
Promotion is not redeemable or exchangeable for cash.
Not valid with any on-going promotions, offers and /or discounts.
Prior reservation is required. To make a reservation, call +605 255 1555 and mention your promo code.
Rooms are subject to availability.
Strictly no refunds once a payment is made to confirmed your reservation.
No amendments allowed after your reservation is confirmed. Voucher is subject to forfeiture for cancellation, no-show, or unused voucher.
Website: http://ipoh.mboutiquehotels.com/

title: Blooming
contentText: Non-Valentine's Special 20% discount fresh flowers with a minimum purchase of RM100.
Valentine's Special 10% discount fresh flowers minimum purchase of RM100.
tncList: Promo valid from 1 January 2016 - 30 April 2016.
This discount is valid for WALK-IN customers only. Customer to show the proof of promotion redeemed for this offer from Maxis mobile app to enjoy the discount.
Customers are entitled for 20% discount for all fresh flowers products throughout the whole promotional period EXCEPT during the Valentine's from 10 February - 15 February (both dates are inclusive).
Minimum purchase amount is RM100 and above.
